channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: What’s New in AI for Security from Microsoft Entra?
item.description: Your teams are moving fast—and so are we! We’re committed to putting the most advanced identity security tools at your fingertips, so you can secure access with speed, precision, and confidence.This is the first of a regularly updated series highlighting the newest AI-powered capabilities in Microsoft Entra—each designed to help you investigate threats faster, manage identities more effectively, and automate protection with less effort. From natural language-driven investigations to proactive optimization powered by AI agents, these updates are all about helping you stay ahead of attackers whi...
